Reviews.Content: nice pension First of all the Modena is avery good Pension not a Hotel.I found it avery nice place to stay for 2 nights,spotlessly clean.good breakfast.staff very nice,its a lovely building and so differant to staying in a hotel,but i always get a feeling that i am in someones home compared to staying in a hotel.But its a great value considering what i payed,also very good location to start your sightseeing.
Reviews.Author: morgangeth

Reviews.Content: Hotel Modena- Very Quaint! Stayed at this hotel for one week, was sent by work so was told to book the cheapest one I could find, but was pleasantly surprised. Hotel is in a really nice area, lots of eateries and bars nearby- also train station about a five minute walk away.Very clean, good breakfast, nice friendly staff (no tv in my room though!) Overall definately recommended
Reviews.Author: beckie-o

Reviews.Content: Great hotel I am just back from a five day trip in the Hotel Pension Modena with a friend and I can't recommend it enough.We arrived just after 11am and although we weren't expecting the room to be ready, we were pleasantly surprised to be told that we could check in immediately.We had booked a twin room with bath and shower facilities through [--] but the room was really a triple room with plenty of space, facing the back of the premises, high ceilings and plenty of natural light (it was room 26 by the way!).The staff were so pleasant and very welcoming despite the fact that neither my friend nor I spoke any German. They were very accommodating with regard to speaking English and it was very much appreciated. The breakfast consisted of orange juice, yoghurts, fresh bread (white and brown), eggs, cheese, cold meats and tea or coffee. It was more than adequate and was a very good way to start the day.The location of the Modena is perfect - situated just off the Ku'damm. If I ever return to Berlin, this is where I will be staying.
Reviews.Author: Paul_Ireland

Reviews.Content: Love this Pension--Return Visitor Hotel Modena is a quiet, clean and friendly pension in the heart of an artsy, fun area of Berlin. We were actually here on business-- for a trade show but the atmosphere really made it seem more like a vacation.The owners are extremely helpful and accommodating. Although the rooms are small they are adequate and well taken care of. For the cost conscious traveller--business or pleasure you really can't go wrong.The restaurants and shopping in the area are among the best in the world.
Reviews.Author: BizTraveller2000
